timeline.bodyText: hmmm... as a general rule we need to think of sanitizing the input params.
timeline.author: mycpuorg
timeline.diffHunk:

-            model_dict['sourceVocab'] = self.source_vocab
+            model_dict['sourceVocab'] = self.source_vocab.split("/")[-1]

replies.bodyText: What was the value of self.source_vocab that made this problematic?
